Detailed Description

Implementation of snipet dialog. This dialog permit to create, modify. The implementation containts only a constructor who defines default dialog presentation : Windows Style Dialog.

QWidget *  parent = 0,
Qt::WFlags  f = Qt::MSWindowsFixedSizeDialogHint

Constructor of the snipet dialog implementation. We defines a default windows flags. The windows can't be resize.

Parameters:
text Text used for the template
parent The parent of the dialog
f Flags to use on Windows. By default, the dialog have a fixed size.
